text: To ensure that only Tcell signaling was being affected by U0126 , we used an APC-free system in which the Tcells were differentiated in the presence of increasing doses of anti - <extra_id_0> CD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and a constant amount of <extra_id_0> IL-12 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .

As in the APC - driven cultures , stronger TCR stimulation together with <extra_id_0> IL-12 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> led to higher percentages of cells producing both <extra_id_0> IL-10 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> IFN-gamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> after 1 week of culture ( Figure5C ) .
